description:
EPILEPSY WARNING!

ButterChurn is a WebGL implementation of the MilkDrop 2 visualizer as you might know it from winamp.

Triple click to keep the current preset
Quadruple click to skip to the next preset


TODO:
- custom presets
- settings


Thanks to:
Jordan Berg (Butterchurn JavaScript library)
Ryan Geiss (MilkDrop 2)
title: Butterchurn - Audio Visualizer
